PipelineInspMetricConfig.name: PipelineInspMetricConfig
PipelineInspMetricConfig.description: Represents the configuration of a forecast category metric that appears in the Pipeline Inspection view.

DeveloperName.description: Read only. The unique name of Pipeline Inspection metric configuration in the API.

IsCumulative.description: Read only. Whether the metric is cumulative.

Language.description: Read only. The language of the Pipeline Inspection metric.

MasterLabel.description: Customized label of the Pipeline Inspection metric. Limit: 50 characters.
